description: Limits the data cube to contain only data that matches against the specified expression. The attribute to match against is specified with the parameter `name`. See the Collection Discovery for potential atttibute names. The dimensionality and resolution don't change.

name.description: Name of the attribute to filter on.

expression.description: Expression to evaluate against the attribute values.

x.description: A value of any data type could be passed.

returns.description: A data cube with only data that matches the expression.
